explains: n. 期待，预期；期望，指望
wordGroup: in expectation 期望着；意料之中
expectation of life 平均寿命；预期寿命（等于life expectancy）
mathematical expectation 数学的期望值
live up to expectations 按照期望做到，不负众望
rational expectation 理性预期；合理预期

sentences.en: There was an air of expectation and great curiosity.
sentences.cn: 有着一种期待和好奇的感觉。

sentences.en: I applied for the post more in hope than expectation.
sentences.cn: 我申请这个职位是希望多于期待。

sentences.en: We are confident in our expectation of a full recovery.
sentences.cn: 我们满怀信心地期待着完全康复。
